abstract: A fake story about Facebook and Twitter offers a lesson in taking a closer look at URLs.
snippet: A fake story about Facebook and Twitter offers a lesson in taking a closer look at URLs.
lead_paragraph: Sorry to put a damper on the tweetstorm, but that “New York Times” story going around about Facebook buying Twitter is an April Fools joke. And it’s not even our April Fools joke.

headline.main: Avoid April Foolishness: Check That Web Address
